thread.title: Richard M.
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Richard M.

author: Richard M.
title: Richard M.
text: The Veterans Administration held our home loan captive pending resolution of a minutia of bacteria in our well water. We faced a critical interest rate lock expiration date within a period of rising rate. Time of the essence! First, we discussed chlorination of the well - - with freezing temperatures and foreign visitors, the timing and requirements seemed insurmountable. Then, we found the PELICAN UV system on the internet and ordered it delivered overnight, installed it within 18 hours, let it do its thing and the county gave us a clean water report on the first business day following installation...we'll close our refinance with a VA loan tomorrow!
